code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import editprofile from"../images/Edit.svg";import addcard from"../images/Signo+.svg";import Card from"./Card.js";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Main(props){var currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile__avatar",onClick:function onClick(){props.onEditAvatarClick();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile__image",src:currentUser.avatar,alt:"Foto de Perfil",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(currentUser.avatar,")")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"profile__name",children:currentUser.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"profile__occupation",children:currentUser.about})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"profile__edit",onClick:function onClick(){props.onEditProfileClick();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile__icon",src:editprofile,alt:"icono de l\xE1piz para editar perfil."})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-button",id:"addButton",onClick:function onClick(){props.onAddPlaceClick();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"add-button__icon",src:addcard,alt:"Icono del signo + para a\xF1adir card."})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"elements",children:props.cards.map(function(card){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{card:card,owner:card.owner,name:card.name,link:card.link,likes:card.likes,onCardClick:props.onCardClick,onCardLike:props.onCardLike,onCardDelete:props.onCardDelete},card._id);})})]});}export default Main;
